## Config

Menu Options > Config

![](../man/figures/articles/config/spada_config.png)

In **Spada** yout can choose some configurations that will persist trough RDS files saved in the R_user_dir folder. One file for Session Data and another file for Config.

The options available are:

- **Plot** colors

  - Line: color of the line
  - Fill: fill color of plots
  

- [**Themes**]( https://lgschuck.github.io/spada/articles/themes.html)

  - Spada: default theme
  - Dark Spada: based on Boosttrap Darkly 


- **Size** of inputed files

  - choose the size of files to be imported (default 1 GB)
  
  
- **Session**
  
  - Restore data at startup:
    
    - Always
    
    - Never (default)
    
  - Save when exit: 
    
    - Always
    
    - Ask (default)
    
    - Never

![](../man/figures/articles/config/config_save_session.png)
